<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Starter Project
</h1>

1.  **Useful Scripts**

    **Install**

    ```sh
    yarn install
    ```

    **Run Locally**

    ```sh
    yarn dev
    ```

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`. Hot reloading is enabled.

    _Note: You'll also see a second link: _`http://localhost:8000/___graphql`_. This is a tool you can use to experiment with querying your data. Learn more about using this tool in the [Gatsby tutorial](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/tutorial/part-five/#introducing-graphiql)._

    This includes Gatsby's "gatsby clean" script which clears Gatsby's cache. This is usually good practice but
    may cause unexpected errors if you're not aware of it.

    **Build Optimized Version**

    ```sh
    yarn build
    ```

    **Serve Optimized Build**

    ```sh
    yarn serve
    ```

    **Rebuild Icons Sprite File**

    ```sh
    yarn icons
    ```

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
